file.name: ratings-api.v1.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: ratings-api
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: David onuh
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: 'https://github.com/iamdavidonuh/soeluma/blob/main/LICENSE'
  description: 'Searches and returns details of a movie title, emphasis on the ratings'
servers:
  - url: 'https://soeluma-api.herokuapp.com'
    description: Soeluma Heroku
paths:
  /api/get-movie:
    post:
      summary: Get Movie data
      tags:
        - movie-ratings
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  _id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  title:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  studio:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  avgRating:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      $numberDecimal:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                    required:
                      - $numberDecimal
                  consensus:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  movie_id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  synopsis:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  theaterReleaseDate:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  meta_data:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      studio:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      isInTheaters:
                        type: boolean
                      adjustedScore:
                        type: number
                      ratingSummary:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          topCritics:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              averageRating:
                                type: number
                              meterValue:
                                type: number
                              numReviews:
                                type: number
                              meterClass:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              numRotten:
                                type: number
                              hasScore:
                                type: boolean
                              hasReviews:
                                type: boolean
                              numFresh:
                                type: number
                            required:
                              - averageRating
                              - meterValue
                              - numReviews
                              - meterClass
                              - numRotten
                              - hasScore
                              - hasReviews
                              - numFresh
                          audience:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              numTotal:
                                type: number
                              averageScore:
                                type: number
                              ratingType:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              meterScore:
                                type: number
                            required:
                              - numTotal
                              - averageScore
                              - ratingType
                              - meterScore
                          allcount:
                            type: number
                          freshcount:
                            type: number
                          dvdcount:
                            type: number
                          consensus:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          allCritics:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              averageRating:
                                type: number
                              meterValue:
                                type: number
                              numReviews:
                                type: number
                              meterClass:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              numRotten:
                                type: number
                              hasScore:
                                type: boolean
                              hasReviews:
                                type: boolean
                              numFresh:
                                type: number
                            required:
                              - averageRating
                              - meterValue
                              - numReviews
                              - meterClass
                              - numRotten
                              - hasScore
                              - hasReviews
                              - numFresh
                          rottencount:
                            type: number
                          topcount:
                            type: number
                        required:
                          - topCritics
                          - audience
                          - allcount
                          - freshcount
                          - dvdcount
                          - consensus
                          - allCritics
                          - rottencount
                          - topcount
                      isPlaying:
                        type: boolean
                      id:
                        type: number
                      title:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      vanity:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      officialUrl:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      advisory:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      synopsis:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      casts:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          creators:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              required: []
                              properties: {}
                          castItems:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required: []
                              properties:
                                person:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    name:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                    thumbnailImg:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                    url:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                  required:
                                    - name
                                    - thumbnailImg
                                    - url
                                characters:
                                  type: array
                                  uniqueItems: true
                                  minItems: 1
                                  items:
                                    required:
                                      - name
                                    properties:
                                      name:
                                        type: string
                                        minLength: 1
                          screenwriters:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - name
                                - thumbnailImg
                                - url
                              properties:
                                name:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                thumbnailImg:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                          directors:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - name
                                - thumbnailImg
                                - url
                              properties:
                                name:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                thumbnailImg:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                          producers:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - name
                                - thumbnailImg
                                - url
                              properties:
                                name:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                thumbnailImg:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - creators
                          - castItems
                          - screenwriters
                          - directors
                          - producers
                      mainTrailer:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: number
                          thumbUrl:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          mp4Url:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          hlsUrl:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - id
                          - thumbUrl
                          - mp4Url
                          - hlsUrl
                      isOnDVD:
                        type: boolean
                      year:
                        type: number
                      trackingType:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      genreSet:
                        type: array
                        uniqueItems: true
                        minItems: 1
                        items:
                          required:
                            - id
                            - displayName
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: number
                            displayName:
                              type: string
                              minLength: 1
                      isUpcoming:
                        type: boolean
                      reviews:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          total:
                            type: number
                          reviews:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - id
                                - creationDate
                                - isRotten
                                - original_score
                                - quote
                                - freshness
                                - isTop
                                - url
                                - isFresh
                              properties:
                                id:
                                  type: number
                                creationDate:
                                  type: number
                                isRotten:
                                  type: boolean
                                original_score:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                quote:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                links:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    review:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                  required:
                                    - review
                                freshness:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                isTop:
                                  type: boolean
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                isFresh:
                                  type: boolean
                                critic:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    id:
                                      type: number
                                    name:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                    thumbnailImage:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                    url:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                  required:
                                    - id
                                    - name
                                    - thumbnailImage
                                    - url
                                publication:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    name:
                                      type: string
                                      minLength: 1
                                    url:
                                      type: string
                                  required:
                                    - name
                                    - url
                          links:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              alternate:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              next:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              self:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              prev:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - alternate
                              - next
                              - self
                              - prev
                        required:
                          - total
                          - reviews
                          - links
                      status:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      mpaaRating:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      purchaseOptions:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          iTunes:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              price:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              url:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - price
                              - url
                          vudu:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              type:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              url:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - type
                              - url
                          flixster:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              movieId:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              type:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              url:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - movieId
                              - type
                              - url
                          netflix:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              streamingId:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - streamingId
                          amazon:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              isPrime:
                                type: boolean
                              type:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              url:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - isPrime
                              - type
                              - url
                        required:
                          - iTunes
                          - vudu
                          - flixster
                          - netflix
                          - amazon
                      links:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          alternate:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - alternate
                      boxoffice:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      videoClips:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          mainTrailer:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: number
                              title:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              minutes:
                                type: number
                              seconds:
                                type: number
                              thumbUrl:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              mp4Url:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                              hlsUrl:
                                type: string
                                minLength: 1
                            required:
                              - id
                              - title
                              - minutes
                              - seconds
                              - thumbUrl
                              - mp4Url
                              - hlsUrl
                          videoClips:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - id
                                - title
                                - minutes
                                - seconds
                                - thumbUrl
                                - mp4Url
                                - hlsUrl
                              properties:
                                id:
                                  type: number
                                title:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                minutes:
                                  type: number
                                seconds:
                                  type: number
                                thumbUrl:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                mp4Url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                hlsUrl:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                          size:
                            type: number
                        required:
                          - mainTrailer
                          - videoClips
                          - size
                      runningTime:
                        type: number
                      runningTimeStr:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      url:
                        type: string
                        minLength: 1
                      photos:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          photos:
                            type: array
                            uniqueItems: true
                            minItems: 1
                            items:
                              required:
                                - id
                                - photoType
                                - index
                                - imageId
                                - thumbnail
                                - height
                                - width
                                - submittedDate
                                - submittedBy
                                - url
                              properties:
                                id:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                photoType:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                index:
                                  type: number
                                imageId:
                                  type: number
                                thumbnail:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                height:
                                  type: number
                                width:
                                  type: number
                                submittedDate:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                submittedBy:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                                url:
                                  type: string
                                  minLength: 1
                          length:
                            type: number
                        required:
                          - photos
                          - length
                      isOnOpening:
                        type: boolean
                      isLimited:
                        type: boolean
                      posters:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          thumbnail:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          detailed:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          original:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          profile:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - thumbnail
                          - detailed
                          - original
                          - profile
                      ratings:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          theaterReleaseDate:
                            type: number
                          critics_score:
                            type: number
                          critics_rating:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          dvdReleaseDate:
                            type: number
                          audience_score:
                            type: number
                          audience_rating:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - theaterReleaseDate
                          - critics_score
                          - critics_rating
                          - dvdReleaseDate
                          - audience_score
                          - audience_rating
                    required:
                      - studio
                      - isInTheaters
                      - adjustedScore
                      - ratingSummary
                      - isPlaying
                      - id
                      - title
                      - vanity
                      - officialUrl
                      - advisory
                      - synopsis
                      - casts
                      - mainTrailer
                      - isOnDVD
                      - year
                      - trackingType
                      - genreSet
                      - isUpcoming
                      - reviews
                      - status
                      - mpaaRating
                      - purchaseOptions
                      - links
                      - boxoffice
                      - videoClips
                      - runningTime
                      - runningTimeStr
                      - url
                      - photos
                      - isOnOpening
                      - isLimited
                      - posters
                      - ratings
                  data_created:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  __v:
                    type: number
                required:
                  - _id
                  - title
                  - studio
                  - avgRating
                  - consensus
                  - movie_id
                  - synopsis
                  - theaterReleaseDate
                  - meta_data
                  - data_created
                  - __v
              examples:
                example-1:
                  value:
                    _id: string
                    title: string
                    studio: string
                    avgRating:
                      $numberDecimal: string
                    consensus: string
                    movie_id: string
                    synopsis: string
                    theaterReleaseDate: string
                    meta_data:
                      studio: string
                      isInTheaters: true
                      adjustedScore: 0
                      ratingSummary:
                        topCritics:
                          averageRating: 0
                          meterValue: 0
                          numReviews: 0
                          meterClass: string
                          numRotten: 0
                          hasScore: true
                          hasReviews: true
                          numFresh: 0
                        audience:
                          numTotal: 0
                          averageScore: 0
                          ratingType: string
                          meterScore: 0
                        allcount: 0
                        freshcount: 0
                        dvdcount: 0
                        consensus: string
                        allCritics:
                          averageRating: 0
                          meterValue: 0
                          numReviews: 0
                          meterClass: string
                          numRotten: 0
                          hasScore: true
                          hasReviews: true
                          numFresh: 0
                        rottencount: 0
                        topcount: 0
                      isPlaying: true
                      id: 0
                      title: string
                      vanity: string
                      officialUrl: string
                      advisory: string
                      synopsis: string
                      casts:
                        creators:
                          - {}
                        castItems:
                          - person:
                              name: string
                              thumbnailImg: string
                              url: string
                            characters:
                              - name: string
                        screenwriters:
                          - name: string
                            thumbnailImg: string
                            url: string
                        directors:
                          - name: string
                            thumbnailImg: string
                            url: string
                        producers:
                          - name: string
                            thumbnailImg: string
                            url: string
                      mainTrailer:
                        id: 0
                        thumbUrl: string
                        mp4Url: string
                        hlsUrl: string
                      isOnDVD: true
                      year: 0
                      trackingType: string
                      genreSet:
                        - id: 0
                          displayName: string
                      isUpcoming: true
                      reviews:
                        total: 0
                        reviews:
                          - id: 0
                            creationDate: 0
                            isRotten: true
                            original_score: string
                            quote: string
                            links:
                              review: string
                            freshness: string
                            isTop: true
                            url: string
                            isFresh: true
                            critic:
                              id: 0
                              name: string
                              thumbnailImage: string
                              url: string
                            publication:
                              name: string
                              url: string
                        links:
                          alternate: string
                          next: string
                          self: string
                          prev: string
                      status: string
                      mpaaRating: string
                      purchaseOptions:
                        iTunes:
                          price: string
                          url: string
                        vudu:
                          type: string
                          url: string
                        flixster:
                          movieId: string
                          type: string
                          url: string
                        netflix:
                          streamingId: string
                        amazon:
                          isPrime: true
                          type: string
                          url: string
                      links:
                        alternate: string
                      boxoffice: string
                      videoClips:
                        mainTrailer:
                          id: 0
                          title: string
                          minutes: 0
                          seconds: 0
                          thumbUrl: string
                          mp4Url: string
                          hlsUrl: string
                        videoClips:
                          - id: 0
                            title: string
                            minutes: 0
                            seconds: 0
                            thumbUrl: string
                            mp4Url: string
                            hlsUrl: string
                        size: 0
                      runningTime: 0
                      runningTimeStr: string
                      url: string
                      photos:
                        photos:
                          - id: string
                            photoType: string
                            index: 0
                            imageId: 0
                            thumbnail: string
                            height: 0
                            width: 0
                            submittedDate: string
                            submittedBy: string
                            url: string
                        length: 0
                      isOnOpening: true
                      isLimited: true
                      posters:
                        thumbnail: string
                        detailed: string
                        original: string
                        profile: string
                      ratings:
                        theaterReleaseDate: 0
                        critics_score: 0
                        critics_rating: string
                        dvdReleaseDate: 0
                        audience_score: 0
                        audience_rating: string
                    data_created: string
                    __v: 0
      operationId: post-api-get-movie
      description: 'Returns movie data from search term '
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                movie_title:
                  type: string
              required:
                - movie_title
            examples:
              example-1:
                value:
                  movie_title: Captain America
        description: ''
components:
  schemas: {}
